LocalizedStrings.confirm_append_message: This will continue appending to your current macro, would you like to start over and clear the current macro?
LocalizedStrings.confirm_clear_message: Are you sure you want to clear the current macro?
LocalizedStrings.confirm_open_message: Are you sure you want to load this file and overwrite the currently recorded macro?
LocalizedStrings.error_save_nomacro_message: There is no macro currently recorded.
